issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Serialize arrow schema into metadata when writing parquet
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8423](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8423). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The C++ implementation uses  "ARROW:schema" as a value to store the arrow schema as metadata. Implement same for compatibility.

Having the original Arrow schema is useful for readers as it preserves some properties like dictionary encoding.
